name: Frozen Axe
description:
Turn-based beat-em-up combat on a grid where attacks are only allowed in the horizontal directions.

Decide between dishing out damage with your axe, or controlling space with your flying kick.  Take advantage of pools of lava but don't get surrounded!

Choose from several upgrades after each level, and get through level 10 to beat the game.

Made in a week for the 2019 7DRL.
